text: Right Cross is a 1950 American sports drama movie directed by John Sturges and starring June Allyson, Dick Powell, Ricardo Montalban, Lionel Barrymore, Teresa Celli, Barry Kelley, Mimi Aguglia, and Marilyn Monroe. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Sturges
title: Right Cross
